select a.id, a.user_id as userId, u.name as userName, a.record_id as recordId, b.name as recordName, b.cover , a.record_code as recordCode, a.trade_no as tradeNo, a.price, a.delivery, a.order_id as orderId, a.zbt_status as zbtStatus, a.created_at as createdAt, a.updated_at as updatedAt from delivery_records a left join users u on u.id = a.user_id left join box_records b on b.id =a.record_id
and a.user_id = #{userId},
and u.name =#{userName},
and b,`name` = #{name}
